Common.DESCRIPTION_COOKIE: We use cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. For more information on how we use cookies, please see our cookie policy.
Common.DESCRIPTION_COOKIE_MINIMAL: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience.
Common.LABEL_COOKIE_CONSENT: By clicking <accept>Accept</accept>, you agree to our use of cookies.

Modules.HINT_PLACE_ADDING: Tap on the map to place the marker. Drag to adjust position.
Modules.HINT_AREA_ADDING: Tap to add each point and outline the area. Drag markers to adjust.
Modules.HINT_RULER_TOOL: Tap points on the map to build your route and measure distance.
Modules.HINT_COORDINATES_TOOL: Tap any point on the map to see its coordinates.
Modules.DESCRIPTION_CREATE_PLACE: Create a new place on the map in just a few taps.
Modules.DESCRIPTION_CREATE_AREA: Outline a new area by placing points on the map.
Modules.DESCRIPTION_PLACE_PRIVATE: When enabled, only you can see this place.
Modules.DESCRIPTION_AREA_PRIVATE: When enabled, only you can see this area.
Modules.DESCRIPTION_EDIT_PROFILE: Update your profile information. Save when you're done.
Modules.DESCRIPTION_SETTINGS: Manage your account, preferences, and notifications.
Modules.DESCRIPTION_REFERRAL: Invite friends and earn rewards for each successful referral. Bonuses coming soon!
Modules.DESCRIPTION_PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS: Receive important updates directly on your device.
Modules.DESCRIPTION_EMAIL_NEWS: Stay informed with news and feature updates by email.
Modules.DESCRIPTION_INTERACTIVE_MODE: Enable informational toasts, hints, and tooltips. Error messages will still appear even when this is disabled.
Modules.DESCRIPTION_PRESERVATION_NONE: Object is mostly ruined; only fragments remain.
Modules.DESCRIPTION_PRESERVATION_LOW: Partially destroyed; roof or walls may be missing.
Modules.DESCRIPTION_PRESERVATION_MEDIUM: Main structure intact; some interiors damaged.
Modules.DESCRIPTION_PRESERVATION_AWESOME: Almost untouched; interiors and details intact.
Modules.DESCRIPTION_SECURITY_NONE: No security — anyone can enter without any effort.
Modules.DESCRIPTION_SECURITY_EASY: Very low security — basic locks, easily bypassed or forced.
Modules.DESCRIPTION_SECURITY_MEDIUM: Moderate security — standard locks, alarms, some physical barriers.
Modules.DESCRIPTION_SECURITY_HARD: High security — reinforced doors/windows, good alarms, cameras, difficult to breach.
Modules.DESCRIPTION_SECURITY_IMPOSSIBLE: Extremely secure — heavy fortifications, advanced systems, almost no realistic chance of unauthorized entry.
Modules.DESCRIPTION_SIGNIN: Sign in to your account to continue.
Modules.DESCRIPTION_SIGNUP: Create a new account to get started.
Modules.DESCRIPTION_FEEDBACK: Share your thoughts, report bugs, or suggest improvements.
Modules.DESCRIPTION_REFERRAL_INVITE: Join our community and unlock exclusive rewards
Modules.LABEL_REFERRAL_INVITED_TEXT: Someone special thinks you'd be a great addition to our platform.
Modules.DESCRIPTION_REFERRAL_BONUSES: Special rewards for new members joined via referral program
Modules.DESCRIPTION_REFERRAL_TOOLS: Access to advanced tools for discovering abandoned places and planning expeditions
Modules.DESCRIPTION_REFERRAL_COMMUNITY: Become part of our fast-growing community and find friends
